Hi Amit,

On 4/24/07, meet_goyal <meet_goyal@...> wrote:
>  I have been through a document. this is really very helpful in
>  implementing testcases in junit.
>  I need something more than this, if you can do me a favor for this also.
>  things like:
>  - Junit with Ant,
>  - architectural perspective of junit,
>  - junit with eclipse etc.

Regarding "JUnit with Ant" and "JUnit with Eclipse", you'll find
sufficient tutorials simply by typing those words into Google.
Regarding the "architectural perspective", though, I'm afraid that's a
bit tougher since I don't recall seeing such a description anywhere.
Then again, I'm not sure why you're interested in the architecture of
JUnit?


Lasse
